programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: The outrageous accusations & animosity continues between warring exes Libby & Brian. What happened that prompted Dr. Phil to consider asking Brian to leave and not return?

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil takes an intense look at the life of Star, a stay-at-home mom who fears that her dangerous habit may take a turn for the worse. Star's 11-year-old daughter, Autumn, sends Dr. Phil a poignant plea for help before tragedy strikes.

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Leah says mom Dora appears sweet but she's actually a narcissist, hypochondriac, drama queen & liar. Can this mother-daughter find common ground and rebuild? Plus Carrie says mom Paula, 61, has been meeting strangers online having sex. Dr. Phil weighs in.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil conducts an emotionally-charged intervention with Bobbi Kristina Brown's boyfriend, Nick Gordon, who is battling drug & alcohol addiction and struggling to come to terms with Bobbi's near-drowning & Whitney Houston's death. Will Nick accept help?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Blake, 26, is a college graduate and on the dean's list with a 3.5 GPA. He has thrown it away to sit around and smoke pot in the rent-free house his mom supplied. He has aspirations, like stripping off his shirt to show off his self-professed buff body.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: In one of the most twisted & bizarre love deceptions ever on Dr. Phil, 7 female college students from Brigham Young University face the man they say they fell in love with online but never met in person. Don't miss the surprising twist in this story!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Ben says his wife, Kelly gained a significant amount of weight, is no longer affectionate & stopped cleaning & cooking his favorite meals 6 mos after marrying. Kelly says Ben lost 100 lbs, then became a "narcissist" & a "jerk" Can this marriage be saved?

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando los guardias de la prisión en Virginia interceptan un paquete de pruebas relacionadas con el secuestro de dos niños hace varios años, la UAC interroga a un famoso asesino serial que puede tener información sobre el paradero de los niños.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se sorprende cuando Hotch es arrestado por un equipo SWAT y por sospecha de conspiración, mientras el equipo se apresura a demostrar su inocencia, sospechan que se avecina un complot mayor.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Verdad o consecuencias
programme.desc: Mientras comienza la búsqueda del sustituto de Ziva, Gibbs y los miembros restantes de su equipo deben volver al trabajo con el pasado todavía pesando en sus mentes.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Reunión
programme.desc: El equipo descubre que la extraña muerte de un marine y sus dos amigos puede estar relacionada con su pasado, pero es Gibbs quien acaba haciendo un viaje al pasado.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Informante
programme.desc: El equipo debe investigar de nuevo la muerte de un teniente después de que el bloguero que les acusó de encubrimiento aparezca muerto.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Policía bueno, policía malo
programme.desc: Cuando el cadáver de un marine aparece al otro lado del mundo, la investigación obliga a Ziva a desenterrar un capítulo enterrado de su vida.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El precio de la justicia
programme.desc: Danny y Báez están decididos a conseguir justicia para una joven traumatizada que fue rehén, a pesar de su resistencia a presentar cargos.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Las regals de la mafia
programme.desc: Decididos a hacer justicia por el ataque a Gormley, Danny y Frank buscan la ayuda del detective Anthony Abetemarco, quien tiene vínculos con el barrio donde ocurrió el ataque.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Buen policía, mal policía
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan el asesinato de una anciana por una bala perdida. Mientras, Frank es ridiculizado por disciplinar a un policía irrespetuoso y Erin ayuda a su detective Anthony.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Por la comunidad
programme.desc: Erin y Anthony intentan evitar la deportación de la activista comunitaria Coryna Garza (Judy Reyes), quien no es ciudadana, y Frank debe decidir si el NYPD participará en la redada de alto perfil de los Marshals de EE. UU. contra una pandilla local.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo sigue la pista a un recluso fugitivo que cose la boca a sus víctimas.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo sospecha que un par de asesinos trabajan juntos, después de destapar dos cuerpos aparentemente no relacionados entre sí.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo se apresura a buscar una relación entre dos familias, una asesinada y la otra secuestrada.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo está detrás de un cirujano que hace amputaciones innecesarias.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Jackson has to decide if he's ready for a serious relationship with Jessica, or if pageant girl Savana is more his speed. Rachyl struggles to tell Kerry about a recent text exchange with an Ex who just moved back to Nashville.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Jackson might be biting off more than he can chew when he decides to perform live, and Kerry progresses his music career when he connects with another singer.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: After Kerry comes home late after a night out with Brooke, Rachyl grapples with the state of their relationship. Jackson practices with Jessica for his upcoming birthday performance, but Savana becomes suspicious of how much time they spend together.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: On the season finale, Rachyl and Kerry make a big decision about their future, and Jackson comes to a realization about Jessica (and his music) after Savana's ultimatum.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Kerry wants to hire a publicist, Alexandra prepares for the Miss USA pageant, Jessica looks forward to her wedding, and Rachyl reconnects with an old friend.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Alexandra forces Jackson to make a big decision, Alisa believes Bryant has a secret, and Rachyl gets closer to Jeremiah, which causes tension between her and Jessica.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Alexandra gets revenge on Jackson for flaking, Kerry returns home to find Rachyl has been spending time with another guy, and Alisa confronts Bryant's photographer.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Jackson buys a ring for Baylee despite his friends' concerns, Rachyl bonds with Alexandra after her fight with Jessica, and Bryant criticizes Alisa for lacking motivation.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Jackson recovers from a serious car accident, Jessica considers not inviting Rachyl to her wedding, and Kerry continues to worry about Rachyl's relationship with Jeremiah.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Kerry's publicist pressures him into doing a sexy photo shoot with a female model, Alisa takes a songwriting session with Luke Pell, and Jessica clears the air with Rachyl.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Jessica's bachelorette party takes an unexpected turn, Alexandra makes things awkward for Jackson and Baylee, and Bryant controls the fate of Alisa's song.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: As everyone travels to Arkansas for Jessica and Dre's wedding, Alexandra spills a secret, Alisa gets a surprise, Jackson becomes emotional, and Kerry learns the truth.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Jessica and Dre's wedding day arrives, Rachyl faces repercussions after Kerry learns the truth, and Baylee sees a different side of Jackson.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Rachyl and Kerry reach a decision about their marriage, Bryant makes a confession, Jessica and Dre enjoy married life, and Jackson and Baylee discuss their future together.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: This season the cast packs their bags for the Sunshine State, only to encounter some major shade. Hannah's new love interest divides the house, and with tensions high, Tiffany and Hannah funnel their way into an explosive smackdown.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: After a chaotic first night in the house, Tiffany must deal with the fallout from her fight with Hannah. Meanwhile, a backflip gone-wrong lands Murray in the hospital. And an emotional Lyle is haunted by his past relationship.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: The gang barely survives a wild taxi ride with an angry Mattie, Lauren gets fed up with her shady boyfriend, and Walt & Murray's prank gets hairy.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Daddy proves he has extra-sensory perception and predicts an exciting future for Walt. Lyle can't keep his mind off Santana and starts to think about taking their relationship to the next level.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Hurricane Martha lands on the party house and boys do their best not to let it ruin their night. The next day Mattie calls a family meeting to apologize and the housemates start airing out all their issues.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Now that the sage smoke has finally cleared the air in the house, the roommates hope that Tiffany and Lauren's boyfriends won't bring new drama when they come to visit. Bubba and Destin struggle to stay focused on their mission.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: The trip to Miami gets off to a great start until the sun goes down and shots get poured. When Mattie goes missing, Don "Daddy" Johnson is on the case. Back at the house, Lyle makes a life-changing decision.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Lyle's girlfriend, Santana, comes to visit but little does she know her life is going to change forever. All of the roommates come together to plan the most perfect marriage proposal for Lyle.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Lyle gets an answer for his proposal and the gang throws Mattie an 80s skating birthday party. Tiffany learns some troubling news about Hannah's boyfriend, Cody. Martha redecorates the boys' bedroom.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two men acting strangely in a gas station draw the suspicion of an employee. Deputies arrest a man for creating an unsafe environment for his younger brother. Mom calls the cops when her daughter throws water on her.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The suspect of a carjacking tells an Officer that he would rather go to jail than face the wrath of his mother. An Officer investigates a domestic call involving a husband, wife and a lamp. A slow speed pursuit ensues.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Stop sticks are deployed to intercept a vehicle with bullets. Two suspects watch their life unravel after being found with meth. Police assist young and restless runaways.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A young woman with warrants tries to avoid jail time, deputies confront a hit-and-run suspect, and a routine traffic stop ends with an arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer tackles a masked man with an outstanding warrant, an erratic driver is stopped driving to a nail salon, and police respond to a domestic assault involving hot wax.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man tries to jump out of a car when his friend takes him on a high-speed chase, and a deputy investigates a man he finds walking down a dark road.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a notorious New Jersey drug hotbed. Officers find a suspect hidden under a mattress. A bicycle thief is caught red handed.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers save a suspect's life after arresting him, a man assaults his wife after she uncovers his internet history, and a pregnant woman fears prosecuting her abuser.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman goes to great lengths to hide her daughter, a couple's glovebox holds a surprise, and an Uber driver gets more than she bargained for.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer on street patrol chases down a suspect on foot, an alleged car thief posts his exploits on Facebook, and a crashed stolen car may not have been stolen after all.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A desperate trespasser attempts to give the cops the slip, and a frightened man tries to get the attention of deputies but takes the wrong approach.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A fleeing motorcyclist tries to outsmart officers by hiding his bike in a retail garden area, and a concerned citizen reports seeing a man steal a package from a porch.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: After chasing down a suspect on foot, officers retrieve a fully loaded revolver from his pants, and police respond to a call about a man wielding a knife outside a bar.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers utilize the help of the K-9 unit to find a suspect hiding in a shed. A cooperative suspect is faced with a list of charges. A motorcycle chase comes to an end after the suspect ditches the stolen bike and attempts to flee on foot.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man gets busted during a drug deal, a cyclist gets confused when an officer finds narcotics in his pants, and officers respond to reports of gunfire.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man refusing to comply gets tased, recent texts on a suspect's phone paint a different story from what he's told officers, and a woman tries to hide evidence from police.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A female victim tells the officers that two men kicked in her front door. Three suspects attempt to steal a bicycle in an alley. Following routine questioning of a petrified wife, officer arrests the husband for domestic abuse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A young woman claims not to know her passengers, the search of a man's car leads to more charges, and a woman learns not to start vehicles with a screwdriver.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An inebriated man is arrested after getting caught peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase officers bring down a well-known local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a local mobile home park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police investigate suspicious activity in a known drug area, officers encounter a jaywalker with the munchies, and a woman caught with meth wants points for honesty.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A chase ends when one of the police units successfully performs a pit maneuver which eventually disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A motorcyclist fleeing police slams into a pickup truck at high speed, and a man being frisked invents an interesting story to explain the suspicious bulge in his pants.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies race against time to save a young boy who is trapped inside a house fire. An intoxicated patron demands a beer on credit and argues with a store clerk. An older woman struggles with heroin.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect on the run makes a dangerous decision when he finds himself cornered. An unsuspecting driver gets more than she bargained for when she gives an old friend a lift. A friendly woman has a thing for cowboys.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wanted man takes off running, a woman interferes with a traffic stop involving her boyfriend, and deputies respond to a dispute between a man and his girlfriend's son.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: At the conclusion of an extensive pursuit, the driver eventually loses control of the vehicle and runs into a stop sign. With the aid of stop sticks, a driver’s car becomes disabled. Officers stop a stolen vehicle leaving a drug house.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies are called to a vehicle burglary in progress at an apartment complex. A traffic stop results in the discovery of drug paraphernalia. An officer locates a stolen van and discovers drug paraphernalia in the suspect’s purse.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Two young men are found murdered after scamming Sam Braun's casinos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A casino employee is beaten and raped on her way home from work, but she survives and identifies her attacker.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A feverish night in Las Vegas results in one dead male in an alien suit, one more dead male in a bathtub, one dead female with two suspicous men at the scene, and another dead male with a polaroid of yet another dead male.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Heavy rains in Vegas wash up a body in the storm drains. As the team investigates, they find bones in the sewer system that could only be murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A young girl is abducted from outside a convenience store, triggering an Amber alert.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in a hotel suite with symptoms of the ebola virus.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Sara investigate the murder of a woman after a swap party where the married couples in the neighborhood meet and switch partners.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom is called to a murder of a 17-year-old in a casino penthouse. The entire team gets involved when its discovered that a kidnapping took place along with the murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The killer from The Execution of Catherine Willows returns with deadly results.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman who was pulled over by the police is found murdered two miles up the road from the stop. It's not long before Robbins determines that the woman is, genetically speaking, not a woman.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom is confronted with new evidence while on the stand of a murder trial of a restaurant owner.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team investigate the starving death of a five-year-old boy. They discover the boy has siblings who are in danger too.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Greg, for his final proficiency, has to determine how the Sherlock Holmes of a Sherlock Holmes club was killed.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick looks into the murder of a man by someone who apparently needs a wheelchair. Nick looks into the murder of a woman in the subculture of the narcocorrido, songs about drug murders.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una niña es secuestrada en el exterior de una tienda de comestibles, lo que desencadena una alerta Amber.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una mujer aparece muerta en la suite de un hotel con síntomas del virus del ébola.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y Sara investigan el asesinato de una mujer tras una fiesta de intercambio en la que los matrimonios del barrio se reúnen y cambian de pareja.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un grupo de miembros de una fraternidad encuentra un lugar cubierto de gusanos, Grissom investiga la escena y cree que un estudiante está proporcionando la carne a los gusanos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom es llamado por el asesinato de una joven de 17 años en el ático de un casino. Todo el equipo se ve involucrado cuando se descubre que se ha producido un secuestro junto con el asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una mujer que había sido detenida por la policía aparece asesinada a tres kilómetros de la parada. No pasa mucho tiempo antes de que Robbins determine que la mujer, genéticamente hablando, no es una mujer.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom se enfrenta a nuevas pruebas mientras está en el estrado de un juicio por asesinato del dueño de un restaurante.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo investigan la muerte por inanición de un niño de cinco años. Grissom y su equipo investigan la muerte por inanición de un niño de cinco años. Descubren que el niño tiene hermanos que también están en peligro.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Greg, para su competencia final, tiene que determinar cómo fue asesinado el Sherlock Holmes de un club de Sherlock Holmes.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick investiga el asesinato de un hombre por alguien que aparentemente necesita una silla de ruedas. Nick investiga el asesinato de una mujer en la subcultura del narcocorrido, canciones sobre asesinatos relacionados con las drogas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine, Warrick y Nick encuentran el cadáver de dos mujeres en unas obras enterradas bajo el alquitrán.El turno de swing se adentra en el mundo de las novias extranjeras por correo.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Sofía, Sara y Greg investigan la desaparición de una mujer que volvía a casa tras una noche de fiesta con una amiga después de que su coche abandonado aparezca en el arcén de una autopista.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un importante jugador de Las Vegas aparece muerto, Ecklie ordena a ambos equipos que investiguen el caso. El hombre que tenía secretos sobre todos en Las Vegas tenía uno muy grande propio.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine, Nick y Warrick investigan un cadáver gravemente mutilado en el bosque. Grissom, Sarah y Greg intentan determinar cómo fue asesinado un hombre en una habitación de hotel. Esto les lleva a una convención de mujeres grandes.

programme.desc: A kidnapping case becomes personal for Horatio and the CSI team when the victim unexpectedly turns out to be Boa Vista's sister.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a man is decapitated while doing a daring stunt with his car, the team suspects that it was more than just an accident.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio uncovers a deadly plot against the City of Miami after a young woman is murdered at a charity event. He and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a Marine recruiter is murdered, the CSIs must delve into the world of enlisting soldiers and the families they leave behind.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Det. Frank Tripp's life hangs in the balance when he steps on a land mine while investigating a crime scene. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a truck full of confiscated weapons is hijacked and the weapons are released back into the public, Horatio links the crime to Clavo Cruz.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A member of the team is pronounced dead after being shot in the head. Not wanting to give up, Horatio has the CSI rushed to the hospital.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the CSI team must investigate when the parents of a baby sitter in an upscale neighborhood are brutally murdered.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A hunting weekend turns deadly when someone in the group is mauled by a bear and evidence suggests foul play. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a wealthy real estate developer is killed, Horatio and the CSI team suspect his wife and her two secret twin sisters.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio suspects that the County Supervisor and the owners of a nearby Native American Casino may be involved when a murder victim is found scalped.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team investigate a movie star's death while he was in a celebrity rehab center and on the verge of exposing some damaging secrets.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando su mentor muere mientras desactiva una bomba, Horatio emprende una misión personal para encontrar al culpable. Megan se pregunta si ese caso no es demasiado íntimo para él.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando un sacerdote es asesinado, Horatio y el equipo deben investigar. Una huella de labios en un vaso señala a un monaguillo de 12 años como el principal sospechoso.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Una niña de cinco años es asesinada en un restaurante/área de juegos que atiende a padres e hijos, y Horatio y el equipo deben investigar.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo investigan el asesinato de un stripper encontrado muerto después de una fiesta sexual femenina. La evidencia sugiere que tuvo relaciones sexuales antes de su muerte.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una familia es asesinada en su casa, Horatio y el equipo intentan encontrar al asesino con las pruebas dejadas en el lugar.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Tres personas son asesinadas a tiros en el centro de Miami durante la hora pico y Horatio y el equipo deben atrapar al asesino rápidamente.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Encuentran a una profesora de una universidad local colgada de un árbol después de ser torturada. Había sido torturada durante al menos cuatro horas antes de que la ahorcaran.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran muerta a una niña no identificada cerca de un campo de rehabilitación muy estricto, Horatio y el equipo investigan su asesinato.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Llaman a Horatio y al equipo para investigar cuando encuentran a una prostituta muerta a puñaladas metida bajo una cama después de que se limpió el cuerpo.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando se revela que una red de laboratorios clandestinos está fabricando drogas mortales, Horatio y Speedle investigan la situación.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y Speedle investigan cuando un ladrón y violador ha sido agredido sexualmente y atado con cintas a los pilares de su cama después de que lo mataron por asfixia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo se exponen a radiación mientras investigan un asesinato, lo que los lleva a un abogado ambientalista que se muere de envenenamiento por radiación.

programme.desc: Llaman a Horatio y al equipo para investigar el asesinato de un inmigrante de Europa del Este asesinado a puñaladas en una cabina de espectáculos eróticos.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y su equipo se apresuran para encontrar nuevas pruebas para un juicio en curso por asesinato para evitar la condena de un hombre posiblemente inocente.

programme.desc: The CSIs investigate a woman's death as the work of a serial killer. Mac reconnects with his first partner after an ex-con begins stalking him.

programme.desc: Following a near-death experience, Detective Mac Taylor becomes quite determined to close his last remaining unsolved case.

programme.desc: When the body of a beautiful young woman is found in a stolen Ferrari, the investigation leads to a family of car thieves.

programme.desc: A night out for a friendly drink takes a very unexpected turn when Danny and his rookie cops are caught up in a shooting.

programme.desc: The CSI New York team investigates when the recently paroled brother of a young basketball prodigy is implicated in a murder.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: As the CSI New York team investigates the assassination of a judge. Jo comes face to face with a criminal from her past.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: Un caballero de brillante armadura empalado con una lanza en Central Park y un empresario apuñalado con un picahielos en un hotel cercano comparten una conexión.

programme.desc: Anulan la sentencia contra un asesino en serie cuando Mac encarcela al oficial que lo arrestó, pero aparece una víctima con la firma del asesino.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI queda desconcertado cuando las pruebas y los testigos señalan a John McEnroe como su sospechoso de asesinato a pesar de su coartada irrefutable.

programme.desc: Mac, Stella y Hawkes se ven obligados a salvar el laboratorio cuando un capo de la droga y su pandilla bajan a la bóveda del equipo de CSI para recuperar su mercancía.

programme.desc: Un asesinato en la estatua de la libertad sacude a la ciudad de Nueva York mientras el equipo de CSI intenta atrapar al asesino antes de que vuelva a atacar.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga la muerte de un buceador profesional vinculado a un rumor de tesoro hundido en el puerto de Nueva York.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga un asesinato relacionado con una serie de robos de espías dirigidos a la élite mientras Mac sigue recibiendo misteriosas llamadas telefónicas.

programme.title: CSI: New York

programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga una serie de asesinatos en Nueva York que giran en torno a un mundo de Internet, aparentemente perpetrados por un asesino a sueldo.

programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga dos misteriosos asesinatos en Noche de Brujas: uno, un aparente ataque zombi; el otro, un asesinato/suicidio simulado en una casa con un pasado espeluznante.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI trabaja para resolver dos asesinatos aparentemente sin relación que, después de las investigaciones en curso, resultan estar conectados.

programme.title: Ip Man

programme.title: Fuera del cielo

programme.title: No eres tú, soy yo

programme.title: Aquí entre nos

programme.title: El crimen del Padre Amaro

programme.title: Zona de muerte
programme.desc: Christopher Walken se despierta de un coma debido a un accidente automovilístico, solo para descubrir que ha perdido cinco años de su vida y, sin embargo, ha ganado poderes psíquicos.

programme.title: Cujo
programme.desc: Mientrtas Donna y Vic Trenton luchan para salvar tambaleante su matrimonio, su hijo Tad se hace amigo del adorable San Bernardo de 90 kilos de su mecánico.

programme.title: Drácula 2000
programme.desc: El maestro del terror Wes Craven presenta una adaptación moderna y sexy del clásico thriller gótico. Luego de que Drácula despierta de su sueño de 100 años, su primer destino es Estados Unidos y la exótica ciudad de Nueva Orleans.

programme.title: Zona de muerte
programme.desc: Christopher Walken se despierta de un coma debido a un accidente automovilístico, solo para descubrir que ha perdido cinco años de su vida y, sin embargo, ha ganado poderes psíquicos.

programme.title: Supernova: el fin del universo

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Anna Paquin protagoniza este thriller en el que caracteriza a una adolescente cuya vida cambia cuando su familia se muda a una nueva casa con secretos. Poco después una serie de sucesos sobrenaturales desencadenarán el mal que habita en la casa.

programme.title: Carrie (2002)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis protagoniza esta adaptación de la clásica historia de terror de Stephen King. Carrie es una chica tímida con poderes telequinéticos y cuando sus torturadores la someten a un acto de humillación, todos aprenderán una lección mortal.

programme.title: Nacho Libre

programme.title: Envidia
programme.desc: Un hombre empieza a sentir cada vez más celos del nuevo éxito de su amigo.

programme.title: Euroviaje
programme.desc: Europa nunca será la misma después de que Scotty Thomas y sus amigos aterrizan para vivir aventuras y excesos, haciendo las cosas más alocadas en el viaje más salvaje de sus vidas!

programme.title: El Loco Superdotado
programme.desc: El constantemente pobre Darryl se arriesga a perder su trabajo soñado en Wall Street hasta que encuentra un experimento que paga bien y que le otorga sentidos superhumanos... y competitividad. Pero con los efectos secundarios, ¡todo puede pasar!

programme.title: Hot Rod - Brincando el destino

programme.title: El regreso de la tribu Brady

programme.title: Verano de locura

programme.title: Doc

programme.desc: The contestant picks one case which is theirs to keep. As each of the 25 cases is opened, the likelihood of the player having a valuable cash amount in their case decreases or increases, with ‘the Banker’ tempting the player throughout the game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: The contestant picks one case which is theirs to keep. As each of the 25 cases is opened, the likelihood of the player having a valuable cash amount in their case decreases or increases, with ‘the Banker’ tempting the player throughout the game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Rugged entrepreneur and family man David Leeman brings larger-than-life enthusiasm, and beard, in his face-off with The Banker.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: College wrestler-turned-professional MMA fighter Michael Chandler proves just how tough he is when he enters the cage with The Banker.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Real estate agent Toni Miller is used to buying and selling hot properties. Howie has just the challenge for her: a Monopoly-inspired game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia’s T-Bombz campaign is hitting the city and Degrassi. But Holly J has bigger and better things going on. She’s prepping the Power Squad for an out-of-town competition, and things are looking good.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner and Jane have plans for next year – she’ll start pre-law and he’ll attend Police College. When he doesn’t get in, he can’t bear to tell her, so he lies.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Desperate to win Jane back, Spinner sneaks into the Leadership Convention Jane is speaking at and proposes. When Jane turns him down, Spinner breaks up with her – nothing he does is ever good enough.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley’s the star of Degrassi’s first-ever football game win! The Shep is floored at how much Riley’s improved.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare stands up for Connor when he receives unfair treatment from The Shep. The result of their peaceful protest? Detentions for everyone. No one is more frustrated by the detention than Alli. It wasn’t her idea to protest.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Pushed to the edge by Holly J, Alli begins posting nasty things about her on the “anti-Grapevine” blog, the underground school on-line site.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Shep has returned after his sensitivity training and it’s Spirit Week at Degrassi! However spirits are anything but high at home for Jane as she struggles to get her dropout brother Lucas off the couch.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jane admits to herself that her issues with her dad go deeper than the divorce – she thinks maybe he did things to her. Jane is very confused and feels alone. Lucas gives Jane a hard time for creating tension between mom and dad.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma’s tired of being referred to as Kelly’s girlfriend and Blonde Emma – she’s not even blonde anymore! Determined to create a distinct university identity, Emma borrows some pot that was gifted to Kelly and smokes up with Becca and Gwyneth.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alli wants Johnny to like her, a lot. She worries she’s going to lose him to an older more “experienced” girl so to make sure she keeps her man close, Alli decides to play with the big kids at a ravine party.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Stress is at an all-time high at Degrassi with exams approaching and course selections due for next term.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Blue asks Holly J to the winter dance in a very romantic way. Only problem? Holly J thinks she might have a thing for her co-worker, Spinner. While Blue is a dreamboat, Spinner is a goofball.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Kevin Smith and Jason Mewes are back! But this time, the Degrassi gang ventures to L.A. via school bus to score parts in Mewesical High, a fictional musical directed by Jason Mewes.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Kevin Smith and Jason Mewes are back! But this time, the Degrassi gang ventures to L.A. via school bus to score parts in Mewesical High, a fictional musical directed by Jason Mewes.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Kevin Smith and Jason Mewes are back! But this time, the Degrassi gang ventures to L.A. via school bus to score parts in Mewesical High, a fictional musical directed by Jason Mewes.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Kevin Smith and Jason Mewes are back! But this time, the Degrassi gang ventures to L.A. via school bus to score parts in Mewesical High, a fictional musical directed by Jason Mewes.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Mia is offered a MAJOR modeling contract in Paris, Peter decides he’ll go with her. But he soon realizes he doesn’t fit into her sophisticated world.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Peter discovers his recreational drug was not-so-recreational meth, he swears he’ll never touch the stuff again. But with the reality of coming down, Peter realizes he just wants more.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s Club Fair Day and Alli and Clare sign up for the Photography Club. Watch out Annie Leibovitz! Everyone who’s anyone is getting involved in something – except Johnny.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jane and Spinner have been through so much together. They’re best friends. Jane’s just come out of a difficult year at home, so hanging out with Spinner is safe and… easy. That’s not a bad thing, right?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alli insists she’s done with Johnny. When she breaks into his locker to steal nude photos of herself back, she, in fact, realizes that she’s so not over him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jane and Holly J team up for a practicum business assignment and immediately bond over their idea to start a babysitting agency.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley’s having a great semester. He’s even taking lifeguard training to prepare for a summer job.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: News travels fast about Riley and Sam’s big fight. Riley doesn’t think much of it – until rumours start spreading that Sam was gay-bashed.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s Matchmaker week at Degrassi and Declan’s not interested in a serious relationship. The Diplomat brat is here for a good time, not a long time.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Against all odds, Holly J has fallen for Declan. Suddenly she gets what everyone’s been so excited about for so long.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: KC’s living the high school dream. The basketball team made it to the provincial finals, the Sports Awards Gala is coming up, and he finally has a mentor who gets him – Coach Carson.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: The world's biggest beasts have always captured the imagination, but whilst being big can have its advantages, it also comes with sizeable challenges. The Komodo dragon's huge appetite means it must take on prey ten times its weight.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: It is only in recent years that experts have unearthed the biggest dinosaurs that ever lived. One monster eclipsed all others, more than seven times as heavy as diplodocus was the immense argentinosaurus.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new generation of carnivores was about to take killing to the next level. At the end of the Cretaceous period, these new hunter killers had spread throughout the globe.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A look at bizarre dinosaurs such as the curious buck-toothed Exipdexipteryx, the amazing four-winged Microraptor and the pot-bellied Nothronychus.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring the newfound remains of a dinosaur species considered the biggest carnivore in history, all while posing the question whether they engaged in a fight against the Argentinasaurus.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: In 2000, scientists made a groundbreaking discovery, explaining how birds evolved from dinosaurs. However, a deeper investigation put a question mark over everything.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring a dinosaur graveyard in Patagonia to gain a better understanding of dinosaur evolution, particularly the Middle Jurassic period when they became gigantic.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards joins the excavation of a subterranean chamber in the Yorkshire Dales where Bronze Age man buried the dead. Plus, there's the first ever prehistoric footprint found in a British cave.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards and Dr Betty O'Brien rely on their expertise and numerous tests to examine the connection between an archaeological site in Donegal and the history of Christianity in Ireland.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards joins the team excavating a massive stone coffin from a building site in Bristol, which should shed light on the Romans' extraordinarily industrious and lavish lifestyle.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards investigates an impressive coffin dug up in Malesbury Abbey. Among the possible identities of the body within are a Saxon king, and Elmer, a monk who survived his attempt to fly from the top of the Abbey tower.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: A team examines the remains of two crouched bodies found in the isolated Somerset community of Bleadon, where modern DNA testing reveals a picture of the arduous life of iron age farmers.

programme.title: The Mystery of Rome's X Tomb
programme.desc: Dr Michael Scott investigates the secrets of a tomb containing over 2,000 bodies in one of the catacombs of Rome.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino-den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus, an animal so large that even its poo was deadly.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil
programme.desc: A prison riot puts Jo in danger while the Doctor assists the Brigadier. Meanwhile, at the World Peace Conference, the Chinese delegate's aid prepares to kill the American delegate.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil
programme.desc: Newly recovered, the Doctor escapes from his cell with Jo. The Master plans to use the Keller Machine to recruit the rioting inmates at Stangmoor Prison and attack the World Peace Conference.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil
programme.desc: The mind parasite within the Keller Machine becomes too powerful for the Master to control. It learns how to move on its own and goes on the hunt for new minds.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil
programme.desc: The Master forms an uneasy alliance with the Doctor so that between them they can subdue the Keller Machine which is now out of control.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil
programme.desc: The Brigadier brings the prison under control, but the Master has escaped and plans to start a world war. The Keller Machine breaks free of the Doctor's restraining device and the Doctor has no choice but to turn the parasite against the Master.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Daemons
programme.desc: The Doctor tries to prevent Professor Horner from breaking into an ancient barrow near the village of Devil’s End. Posing as the village vicar, the Master summons dark forces.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Daemons
programme.desc: Devil’s End is sealed off from the outside world by a heat barrier. The Doctor and Jo return to the barrow where they are confronted by the gargoyle, Bok.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Daemons
programme.desc: The Doctor attempts to help the Brigadier penetrate the heat barrier but is attacked by the Master’s servant in a helicopter. The Master prepares to summon the Daemon Azal.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Daemons
programme.desc: The Doctor is captured by the villagers who are under the Master’s control. Jo goes to the church to prevent the Master from summoning Azal for the final time but is too late.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Daemons
programme.desc: UNIT have penetrated the heat barrier and launch an attack on the gargoyle, Bok. In the cavern, the Daemon Azal confronts the Doctor and the Master to decide the fate of mankind.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks
programme.desc: When Sir Reginald Styles claims to have seen a ghost, UNIT is called in. The Doctor and Jo spend the night at Styles' house and become the target of an assassin.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks
programme.desc: As captive of the guerrillas, the Doctor discovers they intend to change history. Jo is transported to the 22nd Century where she unwittingly gives vital information to the Daleks.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks
programme.desc: The Doctor arrives in a bleak future where Earth is ruled by the Daleks and mankind is enslaved. Rescuing Jo, the two escape but the brutish Ogrons are in pursuit.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks
programme.desc: The Controller betrays the Daleks and is exterminated. The Daleks travel back in time to the 20th Century to ensure that the peace conference fails.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon
programme.desc: The planet Peladon is hoping to join the Galactic Federation. But King Peladon’s Chancellor has been murdered and it seems that the legendary royal beast, Aggedor is to blame.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon
programme.desc: The work of the committee is hampered by sabotage, fear, and suspicion. The Doctor knows the Ice Warriors of old and believes that they may be the guilty party.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon
programme.desc: The Doctor is sentenced to a fight to the death in the pit with the King’s champion, Grun. But the saboteur and killer is still at large.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon
programme.desc: Hepesh, supported by the delegate from Arcturus, is revealed to be behind the attacks. Arcturus is killed but Hepesh escapes to rouse a rebellion against the King.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo visit the Master who is held prisoner on an island. There they learn that several ships have recently been sunk in the area and the Doctor decides to investigate.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils
programme.desc: The Doctor is eager to make peace between the Sea Devils and the humans but has discovered that the Master is up to his old tricks.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils
programme.desc: Jo attempts to rescue the Doctor who is being held prisoner by the Master and Trenchard. The Master plans to summon the Sea Devils from beneath the waves.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils
programme.desc: The Doctor attempts to persuade Captain Hart of the danger that the Master represents. Eager to make contact with the Sea Devils, the Doctor journey's to the sea bed.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils
programme.desc: The Doctor is captured by the Sea Devils and taken to their undersea base. There, he tries to make peace with the creatures, but his efforts are thwarted by the Navy.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils
programme.desc: The Sea Devils come to the surface and attack the Naval base. The Doctor is forced to create a machine that will awaken the creatures across the entire world.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Three Doctors
programme.desc: Attacked by an antimatter creature the Doctor sends an SOS to the Time Lords.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Three Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo pass through the black hole to the desolate world of antimatter.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Three Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors are trapped in the universe of antimatter where they confront Omega.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Wheaten terrier puppy bites when playing; a Jack Russell terrier jumps when the garbage disposal runs and lunges at the dishwasher; a Lab fears shiny floors.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar teams up with horse whisperer Pat Parelli to improve the behavior of the dogs and horses at a riding center; a schnauzer/poodle mix with separation anxiety and dog aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Old and new cases that show the process for adopting a dog, introducing one to the home, setting rules and boundaries and dealing with the loss of a pet.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A pit bull is aggressive toward people and dogs; a dachshund mix exhibits aggression at feeding time and when it comes time to trim his nails.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two Chihuahuas who fight whenever they are in the same room; a dog who attempts to prevent his owner's boyfriend from leaving the house; a dog who is obsessed with moving water.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar revisits some of his toughest cases and explores the history or misunderstood dog breeds to dispel myths about aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar comes the the aid of his good friend Dr Rick Garcia, a vet who is having trouble taming a terrier with epilepsy; Cesar helps a timid Rottweiler called Tank.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A close-knit community on Moorpar in California finds itself endangered by a collection of mischievous dogs, including three huskies.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to restore the peace between a Chihuahua mix and a Mastiff, and tackles an out-of-control pit bull puppy.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: When Susan MacDonald met Cobar, an Australian koolie dog, she thought it would be a match made in heaven, but she was wrong; a Shar-Pei mix is afraid of his own reflection.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A wheaten terrier mix is so attached to her owner that she won't leave his side; a shar-pei who is aggressive towards other dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An English Bulldog who is destroying her owner's house and aggressive towards their other dog; Howie Mandel's chihuahua is aggressive towards him and his wife.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A border collie/greyhound mix with an aversion to other dogs; a woman tries to tame her dog's nervousness; a large dog with too much energy.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps Casey Anderson, of "Expedition Wild," and his wife, actress Missi Pyle, with their dogs; a pit bull's fears make him aggressive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is committed to saving his new friend's bail bonding business, and now must race against time to bring a rogues' gallery to justice in the High Sierra mountain town of Montrose, CO.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With four outlaws still on the lam, Dog sets out to bring 'em in. As day turns into night and with the darkness and the danger mounting, an undaunted Dog and team plan late night hits on the riskiest of locations--their targets' homes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold, Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. So Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge, the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files, Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today, distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision, tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School, and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different from the all-girls private school she attended.

programme.title: 6 Puppies And Us

programme.title: Vuelva el sábado
programme.desc: Una secretaria que va a ser despedida pide otra oportunidad como cobradora pero se enamora de su primer cliente.

programme.title: Encrucijada
programme.desc: Historias reales sobre la bifurcación del camino de diferentes personas, que llevan a cambios en el futuro y hacen frente a una encrucijada.

programme.title: Retofamosos
programme.desc: Seis famosos son reunidos en una azotea para enfrentar los retos más atrevidos, graciosos, chuscos y hasta arriesgados en donde el glamour y la fama se quedan atrás para dar paso a la diversión y el buen humor.

programme.title: A que no puedes
programme.desc: Emocionante juego que enfrenta a dos equipos de celebridades en su intento por realizar pruebas y retos únicos. El equipo que complete con éxito la tarea, ganará dinero para una obra de ayuda social.

programme.title: 100 latinos dijeron
programme.desc: Dos familias competirán respondiendo a distintas preguntas por la oportunidad de ganar dinero basados en las respuestas más populares, de acuerdo a las previamente respondidas por 100 latinos alrededor de Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Mi sueño es bailar
programme.desc: Celebridades ayudan a los participantes a hacer sus sueños realidad. Durante cada episodio la pareja con más puntos obtiene la oportunidad de escoger cual sueño se hará realidad.

programme.desc: THE HERD WITH COLIN COWHERD is a three-hour sports television show hosted by Colin Cowherd and Jason McIntyre. Cowherd is a veteran broadcaster with over 20 years of experience in the sports television and radio field.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To jump from one moving boat to another. Climb into fishing boat tank filled with dead squid and retrieve weights from the bottom. Contestants shimmy out on a flag pole that is approximately 20 feet from the building, free the flag and shimmy back.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Players climb out over the skid and underneath the helicopter. Contestants shoot at target, determining the number of boiled pig rectums they will have to eat. The contestant must navigate around the ledge of a tall building.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Player climbs out of a blimp and onto a rope ladder. Contestants bob in plexiglass box of waxworms. To drive a car into a roll.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To run through a vertical obstacle course. Contestants will put their head inside the box with 24 rats. To cross a plank suspend between to speeding semi-trucks.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants enter the water where there is a 30-yard long tunnel. Unhatched duck's embryo boiled 30 minutes and then served. Contestants must ride a bicycle across a 10" wide plank that is suspended between two buildings.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To jump from moving helicopter onto a floating platform. Place 60 pink toed tarantulas into torture hat and stay still for 3 minutes. The contestant lies in a plexi-glass tube as water is pumped in.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To gather as many flags as possible. To play a game of pool and eat the assigned items. To run across shipping containers planting flags.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A lifelong resident of the tiny town of Lefroy, Tasmania was murdered outside his own home. Robbery appeared to be the motive, but with no suspects, the investigation came to a halt.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Michigan State University grad student disappeared and was presumed dead. With the help of a professor of geological sciences, police hoped to get the "dirt" on her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files: A Special Tribute
programme.desc: 25 years after its premiere, Forensic Files remains the most successful true-crime series of all time. Inspired by the O.J. Simpson murder case, the series went onto over 400 episodes where science catches the bad guys.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Past Lives
programme.desc: The body of a wealthy American businessman was found in his rental car. Teeth and bone fragments were the only remains. When the victim's wife files an insurance claim for $7 million, investigators seek the help of a renowned forensic anthropologist.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a college student is found dead, evidence suggests that he knew his killer. With just three hairs and some microscopic cells, police unravel a web of lies and find the motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A married couple decided to escape the cold of winter with a mini-vacation in Key West. The wife went missing and police searched every square inch of the island; they found nothing but a pair of sandals which might have belonged to her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The bodies of several women are found on a remote hill in California. The police get a break when a prostitute escapes and is able to identify her attacker and his automobile.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three seemingly unrelated deaths prove to be serial murders. The killer had been careful; he used poison which had no taste or odor. Fortunately for investigators, it also had a unique chemical signature.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1988, the body of a young woman was discovered in an Ohio river. Most of the evidence had been washed away, but the victim's 6-year-old son unwittingly told investigators all they needed to know — without saying a word. The clue was in his genes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A murder trail turned cold, until police got a call from a woman whose husband, Gerald Powers, had a criminal past and a fondness for Chevy Berettas.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was the single most deadly automobile accident in American history. Almost a hundred vehicles were involved, twelve people died and more than fifty people were injured. And it happened along a stretch of highway long known for dense, thick fog.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On May 12, 1994, Crystal Perry was viciously murdered in her home in Bridgton, Maine. Michael Hutchinson, 32, was later found guilty in the slaying.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police instituted an intense search when the mother of two young children went missing. Twenty years after her body was found, new technology recontextualized old evidence and pointed directly to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An Alaskan police officer finds a woman's body while on routine patrol of a public park. During the autopsy, the medical examiner preserves the portion of her rib cage which sustained the fatal wound.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man riding a bicycle was fatally injured in what police believed to be a hit-and-run accident. Tiny clues found at the scene created a picture of the vehicle which struck him and led police to its driver.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man disappears one year to the day after beginning an affair with his friend's wife. 15 years later, with the help of a metal detector, police find evidence that would prove what had happened and who was responsible.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While vacationing in California, Earl Morris learns that his wife has gone missing from their Arizona home. The search for Ruby Morris involves dozens of investigators and scientists — and even the Coast Guard.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne attends a Debutante Ball with Lenny when it's found out he's 89th in line to be a duke on the Polish throne.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: The only date - a blind one at that - Shirley finds to make Carmine jealous, is with a former classmate known as Eraserhead (an already balding, chubby, and weird guy). Is it really worth it to get even with Carmine for dating another?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne, Shirley, Frank, and Edna travel to New York to visit Frank's mother and attend a street festival; they are joined there by Lenny and Squiggy (who hitchhiked).

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne, Shirley, Frank, Edna, Lenny, and Squiggy continue their visit to New York, and Frank wants to win a trip to Italy for his mother by winning the Greased Pole competition.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: TV game show "Be Silly for Dollars" comes to Milwaukee. Len, Squig, and the girls are chosen as contestants. The boys are happy, winning a salami, but the girls perform zany stunts to win the grand prize from "The World of Luxury".

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne's new man Jake is exciting, but that excitement turns to danger when he forces her to help rob a store. Shaken up, she begs Shirley to help rid her of him. Jake won't have it, but can they get him to surrender to the police?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Shirley takes a night school Medical Assistance class. Laverne joins her too. Professor Wilner makes learning tough for Laverne so she walks out, as he says she's unteachable. Will Shirley help Laverne bone up and pass the class?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: A bully that works with Lenny and Squiggy is always pushing them around. He gets them to set him up with Laverne, but he has only one thing on his mind. Will the guys step aside or stand up to him and save Laverne?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Shirley befriends a German Shepard at the kennel when its abusive owner claims he's a mad dog. Finding out all unadopted and unclaimed dogs are killed, she and Laverne have a sit-in. Can their efforts save him and all the other dogs?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Frank DeFazio loses some of his Christmas spirit when he has to cancel his yearly gathering for the homeless and poor. The girls and friends step in to help him keep the holiday meaningful for the less fortunate.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Richie lets fame go to his head when he takes a turn as a disc jockey at the local radio station.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: While in Chicago with their high school choir, Richie, Ralph, and Potsie sneak by their chaperons, wind up on the wrong side of an unsympathetic downtown nightclub owner, and win the sympathy of a kind-hearted cocktail waitress.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: The Cunningham family plans a quiet, old-fashioned family Christmas until Richie discovers Fonzie faces a lonely holiday.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Richie is sick in bed with the flu and is bored with eating soup and doing crossword puzzles. But when his family leaves him alone in the house, pandemonium breaks loose when Fonzie, Potsie, Ralph, and a burglar join him.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: It's a new experience for Richie when he becomes romantically attracted to an "older woman."

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Richie, Potsie, and Ralph Malph visit another part of town to meet some girls and find themselves in trouble when the girls' boyfriends show up. Fonzie steps in to save the day.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: For a television show, the Fonz sets a record by jumping his motorcycle over fourteen garbage cans. He ends up crashing into Arnold's chicken stand, and while recuperating from a broken leg, upsets the regimen of the Cunningham household.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: To raise money for the big football game, the boys decide to start their own babysitting service. In Football Frolics, Richie, Potsie and Ralph have their hopes set on seeing the big football game of the year, but tickets can't be found anywhere.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: When Fonzie sets a pigeon coop atop the Cunningham garage and the roof caves, Mr. Cunningham sues to collect damages. In Two Angry Men, Laverne and Shirley prevail upon Fonzie to care for a coop of pigeons.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: After reading too many foreign car manuals, Fonzie is plagued with headaches and is forced to wear glasses for a few weeks, but fears glasses aren't cool.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy is dazed at the reality that she and Mork are the parents of Mearth -half-earthling/half-orkan with the body of a 50-year-old and the mind of an infant and feels lef t out when Mearth accepts Mork as his mommy.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork buys Mearth a fortune in presents to assure his happiness, and when Mindy, fearing a spoiled child, orders that they be returned, their unusual child decides they don't love him anymore.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mearth hates his first day of school on planet Ork so much that Mork and Mindy accompany him back to Ork Prep, where Mork's ancient teacher - who looks like a child - is still sternly in charge.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy, already worried about losing her job at the television station, foresees disaster when Mork and Mearth accidentally transfer minds, forcing her to take Mearth in Mork’s body to meet the new boss.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Terror-stricken Mork believes the examiner assigned to give him a driving test is an incarnation of the devil, and careens along the test course in a spectacular tilted wheelie, with Mindy and Mearth in the car.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: All of Mork's Earth memory is zapped into thin air by vengeful Orson on Ork when Mork neglects his job of reporting back to his planet because of family responsibilities.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: As Shirley goes back for a grocery item, Laverne's at the checkout line, winning a shopping spree. Shirley feels jealous of her, but soon Laverne sees she's forgotten her friend. The two then team up for an all-out 5 minute, Supermarket Sweep.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes the community. Amy and Georgie try to help Tim's traumatized barrel racing horse. Jack helps Tim, Casey, and the rodeo community pull through a devastating loss.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Mallory arrives unexpectedly at Heartland, which has Amy and Jack questioning the real reason for the surprise visit. Lou is upset to learn that her future plans with Mitch may be in jeopardy.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Jake's unexpected arrival prompts Mallory to reveal why she really came to Heartland. Georgie helps Amy with an under-performing cutting horse.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy struggles with the feeling that something is not right with Ty when she and Jack strive to help Ghost, a wild horse linked with Ty's past. Georgie goes on a fun date with Clay's cousin.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: A secret from Jack's past threatens to change his relationship with the family forever.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: The family rallies around Amy to support her while Ty is admitted to the hospital after returning from Mongolia. Georgie helps Olivia save her horse from being put down.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: With Caleb and Cassandra's wedding as well as the birth of Amy and Ty's baby on the horizon, everyone is rushing to make sure both events go down without a hitch.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Ty struggles when his mom makes an unexpected visit in hopes of bonding with her granddaughter.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: The accidental death of Georgie's real parents comes to a head when her brother sends her a newspaper article.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Georgie has a difficult decision to make regarding her equine skills. New parents Amy and Ty try to maintain a social life. Mitch confides in Jack about his move to Calgary.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy and Ty prepare a wild horse for overseas transport but find it more difficult than expected. While training with Flame, Georgie is distracted by Wyatt's return.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Lou returns from New York and presents a difficult decision for Georgie to make about showjumping. Caleb makes a small mistake at the rodeo school. Jack and Lisa adjust to living together.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Lisa reveals to Amy that the racehorse she's working with is a clone. Jen throws a party at Maggie's in honor of Lou's success. Georgie convinces Adam to be Wyatt's math tutor.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: When Tim's erratic behavior sparks concern from his loved ones, Jack suspects something else is going on.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El primer desafío de la temporada encuentra a los concursantes cortando a un rodaballo en finos filetes de 180 gramos. Un miembro de cada equipo debe actuar como camarero durante el servicio de comidas.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Después de que las gallinas los despiertan en sus habitaciones, los concursantes deben cocinar para la cena familiar lo que al principio les cantó.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos equipos compiten para hacer la mayor cantidad posible de pasta para la cena de la noche, y un accidente en la cocina lleva a un competidor al hospital.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El primer desafío para los once Chefs restantes: hacer una pizza gourmet. Los ganadores disfrutan de hamburguesas gourmet en Santa Bárbara mientras los perdedores preparan la cena.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Se espera que los diez Chefs restantes complazcan a una adolescente exigente que vino a Hell's Kitchen para celebrar su fiesta de cumpleaños.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay hace que los nueve Chefs restantes se sometan a una prueba de sabor con los ojos vendados. Los ganadores pueden ir a un spa; los perdedores deben limpiar la habitación.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay pide un voluntario para cambiar de bando. La dinámica del grupo cambia a medida que los equipos enfrentan su próximo desafío: crear cuatro platos con veinte ingredientes específicos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el desafío de apertura, los dos equipos compiten en una carrera de relevos. Los ganadores tienen lecciones de surf, mientras que los perdedores deben limpiar Hell's Kitchen de arriba a abajo.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay inspira a los seis concursantes, llevándolos al restaurante que administrará el ganador de esta temporada. El ganador de la temporada 3, Rock Harper, hace una aparición especial.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay ordena a los cinco Chefs restantes a que enseñen a amas de casa con problemas en la cocina a preparar una comida gourmet. El ganador recibe consejos culinarios de los Chefs Mark Peel y Ben Ford.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los últimos cuatro participantes preparan un almuerzo para los invitados sorpresa: ochenta delicadas madres embarazadas. El Chef que tenga el plato preferido gana un boleto de compras de $1,000. Mientras los demás deben limpiar.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay prepara un desayuno para los Chefs restantes y luego les pide que reproduzcan el plato. Más tarde, Ramsay sabotea la cena para ver cómo reaccionan los competidores ante la adversidad.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos finalistas visitan el restaurante del Chef Ramsay en Nueva York, donde los Chefs ejecutivos de otros restaurantes de Ramsay encuentran que sus platos son únicos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: La cuarta temporada llega a su fin con los finalistas trabajando junto a los competidores previamente eliminados para el servicio de cena final.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: When Drew's obituary is mistakenly printed in a newspaper, Drew realizes he hasn't achieved anything in life.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew mistakenly receives death benefits and spends the money on a motorcycle, adopting a dangerous persona.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
