programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew tries to prevent Lewis from going to hell, but Lewis becomes overzealous in his reforms.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew foolishly assigns Oswald the task of delivering the store's Easter baskets to their customers' houses.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew and Mimi's cousin both want to be named the guardian of Steve and Mimi's baby.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew's new girlfriend gets Lewis in trouble after Drew reveals Lewis's involvement in a toxic dumping program.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew tries to conform to his activist girlfriend's lifestyle, but he ends up corrupting her instead.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew is appointed manager of a new store, but a jealous Mimi launches her most diabolical prank campaign ever.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Kate, Lewis, and Oswald help Drew escape from the insane asylum, but Mr. Wick appoints Mimi as manager.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: In a big dance number, Drew proves he has recovered and gets released from the insane asylum.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew remains married to both Nicki and Kate, though neither woman realizes she is not Drew's only wife.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: When Nicki and Kate discover Drew married them both, they get their revenge and leave him alone.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew tries to win Kate back with a grand gesture, but it only makes things worse. Drew forgives Mimi.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: The new owner promises to promote Drew but dies from a heart attack after a prank at Drew's Halloween party.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew serves as a sex therapist for his parents. Mimi gives advice to Drew's mom on how to fix her marriage.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: In an improvised live episode, Drew and his friends are joined by the stars of "Whose Line Is It Anyway?"

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: The staff must deal with the store's new efficiency expert, Christine, who makes life miserable for everyone.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew has ended marriages with Kate, Nicki, and Mr. Wick, and now he's dating his new boss, Christine.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: When the store reduces salaries, Drew earns money by renting a room in his house to a charming gay couple.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew hopes to become Kate's friend again by helping her find a "lost" Elvis Presley record of folk songs.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Mr. Wick's mother Maggie tries to charm Drew into returning to work for her son - with disastrous results.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: After being named co-manager of Winfred-Louder, Drew resorts to desperate measures to save the store.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: When Drew convinces Mimi to let him take care of her son King Gus, Drew's adventures in baby-sitting go wrong.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew dates a beautiful policewoman and believes he's finally found happiness.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: A wild dog named Rusty starts stalking Drew around his neighborhood, but his friends seem to be avoiding him.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Winfred-Louder's new owner Lord Mercer chooses his teenage daughter Milan to become the store's new president.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew sympathizes with the store's new president, Milan, who wants to impress her father.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Milan invites Drew to her glamorous 20th birthday party in Spain, and Drew concocts a mysterious identity.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: When the peaceful Steve begins provoking fights, Drew tries to decipher what's causing Steve's outbursts.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Milan's divorced mother, Lindsay, a former model, becomes enamored with Drew's simple lifestyle.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: As Lewis searches for a date to attend his ex-girlfriend's wedding, his mother Misty reveals he's a genius.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: When an anti-pornography crusader reveals Cleveland's frequent visitors to adult websites, Drew tops the list.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show

programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog
programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 9/11/22: Michael Harris II slugs his second homer of the game in the 9th, setting the Braves up for a five-run inning and a hopeful victory. However, the stars align for the Mariners as Julio Rodríguez and Eugenio Suárez stage a walk-off win.

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Aokiji's intercession saves Smoker and sends Joker off to rethink his strategy, leaving unanswered questions about Aokiji's current status. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats catch their breath as the Sunny makes its way through the rough seas of the New World.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind -- but while they fear Donflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Breed has Luffy, Trafalgar, and Chopper firmly in his grasp with his Peto-Peto power! Breed dreams of a world in which he has enslaved all the humans, but Luffy's stubborn persistence and unwillingness to cooperate may have landed him in hot water.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Dressrosa! Luffy and the Straw Hats divide into teams and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy and the others encounter a mysterious blind man.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Out and about in Dressrosa, Luffy and his team encounter a mysterious and powerful blind gambler - and run into trouble while his shocking powers distract everyone! Meanwhile, a major event in the Colosseum draws huge crowds.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro, Sanji, and Kin'emon strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji finds himself mesmerized by the beautiful dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosa woman - with a deadly secret!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! From up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.

programme.desc: On their first date, a young woman and her friend are shot execution style at a deserted reservoir; two strangers' lives collide when they are caught up in a deadly train collision.

programme.title: RiffTrax: Kiss of the Tarantula
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this twisted classic horror movie where a beautiful spider-loving mortician's daughter unleashes tarantula-filled revenge on all who wrong her! This feature is a parody.

programme.title: RiffTrax: Light Blast
programme.desc: Starring Erik Estrada and directed by the guy who gave us Warriors of the Wasteland, Light Blast is an 80s fever dream of explosions, car chases, and of course, Light Blasting. This feature is a parody and contains a comedic commentary by RiffTrax.

programme.title: RiffTrax: Lycan Colony
programme.desc: Lycan Colony takes everything you know about werewolves and asks “But what if it were dumber, cheaper, and the aspect ratio occasionally got all squished up for no apparent reason?” This feature is a parody and contains a commentary by RiffTrax.

programme.title: RiffTrax: Manos the Hands of Fate (SV)
programme.desc: Many years ago the people of El Paso, Texas gave their money to a local fertilizer salesman and said, “Go make us the best horror movie you can make.” The result is an object lesson in why you should never give your money to an El Paso fertilizer salesman

programme.title: RiffTrax: Martial Law
programme.desc: Steve McQueen's son Chad stars as Sean Thompson, who has achieved a high rank on the police force despite having the raw charisma of a collectible spoon. This parody contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary from RiffTrax.

programme.title: Rifftrax Shorts: The Calendar: How To Use It
programme.desc: The Calendar. Whether you choose a Far Side page-a-day, an Anne Geddes year-of-horror or Twelve Months of Lifeguards that May Be Used as Flotation Devices, one thing is certain: none of us know how to use the damn things.

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: At Your Fingertips: Floats (Live Edition)
programme.desc: This short instructs how to build a general TYPE of garbage-craft, a floating garbage craft, rather than focusing on utilizing a specific type of garbage to build a craft. This short is a parody and contains a comedic commentary by RiffTrax.

programme.title: Kill Or Be Killed
programme.desc: Kill or Be Killed is a cornucopia of wonders, specifically South African martial arts wonders. It's got a long-haired karate hero and a whacked-out plot. Join Mike, Kevin & Bill as they riff or be killed!

programme.title: RiffTrax Live: Space Mutiny
programme.desc: Space Mutiny! The very title conjures up many memories: tiny cars, writhing spandex witches, deadly railings. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin, and Bill from MST3K.

programme.title: RiffTrax Live: Star Raiders
programme.desc: In 2762, the galaxy is plagued with wars using hokey special effects. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from MST3K.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: The new Misery Inc. catalogue is out, and Jimmy, thinking that the stuff is free, orders up every item. --- Jimmy and Beezy compete to snag the coveted hoof prints of Wrecken, their favourite soccer star.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: Jimmy introduces a stressed-out Lucius to the foreign concept of a “vacation.” --- Heloise, Jimmy, and Beezy attempt to unite Cerbee with his true love, Jez's boohuahua "Jazmeen".

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: After two racecar-driving fleas infest Jimmy’s and Beezy’s brains, the boys vie for title of fastest Miseryvillian. --- Jimmy tries Heloise’s ‘People Copier’ and ends up with an army of ‘Himmies’ who mimic his every move.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: Jimmy suspects that his new neighbor is really the thing he fears most… a giant pickle. --- Jimmy and Beezy vie to join the Rodeo Clown's 'Cool Clown Club'.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: Jimmy turns the tables on Lucius Fools Day, the one day a year when Lucy gets to inflict more misery than usual. --- After accidentally lopping off Lucius’ horns, Jimmy must turn to one of Heloise's concoctions to make things right.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: When the Heinous Museum is under attack, Heloise and Jimmy are pressed into security service. --- Lucius and the Weavils sign a peace treaty forcing Beezy to marry the unsightly Princess Weavil.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Leah and Jeremy get serious, while Chelsea breaks down on Adam's birthday. Jenelle questions if Andrew is really Jace's while Kailyn's is asked out on a date.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Chelsea hopes a reckless moment doesn't come back to haunt her, Kailyn files for a protection order against Jo, Jenelle's fresh start is threatened by a text, and Leah suffers a loss.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Kailyn and Jo attend their protection-from-abuse hearing in court, Chelsea starts beauty school, Leah struggles with her feelings for Corey, and Jenelle learns upsetting news about Gary.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Kailyn and Jo try to work out a fair co-parenting arrangement, Jenelle celebrates completing probation, Chelsea is upset by Adam's change of plans, and Leah makes a painful decision.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jenelle wants to boost her self-confidence, Kailyn is upset when Jo moves out of state, Chelsea acts to avoid another pregnancy scare, and Leah wonders if she made the right choice.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Kailyn asks Javi to move in with her, Chelsea stresses over finding a new place to live, Jenelle gets a surprise while recovering from surgery, and Leah asks Jeremy for a second chance.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jenelle tries to show her mom she's ready to take care of Jace on her own, Chelsea moves into her new home, Leah plans her wedding while looking to buy a house, and Kailyn loses her cool.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jenelle and Gary's relationship takes a sudden turn, Leah and Jeremy consider moving up their nuptials, Kailyn and Javi talk about their future, and Chelsea is concerned about Adam's texts.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Leah asks Corey to pay more child support, Chelsea consults her lawyer about Adam's puzzling request, Jenelle and Gary's relationship takes a dark turn, and Kailyn and Javi visit Las Vegas.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Kailyn and Javi have reason to celebrate, Jenelle finds comfort in Kieffer, Chelsea takes a leave of absence from beauty school, and Leah weighs asking her dad to walk her down the aisle.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Leah and Jeremy's big day arrives, Chelsea celebrates her 21st birthday with friends, Jenelle shares her financial woes with her mom, and Kailyn gets a surprise from Javi and Isaac.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jenelle's relationship with Kieffer worries her mom, Chelsea celebrates Aubree's birthday, Kailyn tells Jo about her plans with Javi, and Leah looks into Ali's developmental problems.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Leah brings Ali to a specialist, Kailyn and Javi marry before he leaves for basic training, Chelsea's first day back to school hits a snag, and Jenelle and her mom tangle over her drug use.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: While living in recovery, Jenelle copes with an unexpected pregnancy, Leah's daughters prepare for Corey's wedding, Kailyn has her baby shower, and Chelsea confronts Adam.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan se enfrenta a Armando al saber que fue él quien golpeó a Franco, Fernando le explica a la familia Elizondo por qué existe un pleito entre ellos, a Jimena le cuenta lo que pasa con Rosario.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Jimena está deprimida, Leandro la convence de que cambie su actitud, pero Franco busca a Rosario en el bar. Armando tiene en la mira el negocio que quiere comprar y cómo deshacerse de su rival.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: La policía investiga el altercado entre los Reyes y Armando, quien no se mueve del bar para no despertar sospechas; la policía lo interroga. La desaparición de Jimena y Óscar alarma a todos.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Las Elizondo están desconsoladas y Juan se desespera porque no hay noticias de su hermano. Óscar y Jimena encuentran ayuda al atravesar el desierto, se preguntan si se trata de una alucinación.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Soledad está decidida a entregarse a Hugo en una segunda oportunidad y cree que está con él en la cabaña. Arturo espera los resultados de la trampa que tiene planeada para el juez.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Alcides y Daniel no se dan por vencidos, ambos se disculpan con Soledad, pero Alcides gana ventaja sobre Daniel cuando envía a Hércules a una gestión que complica la situación para Von Shirak.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Hugo descubre el plan para quitar a Daniel del camino, pero cree que Arturo también está implicado. Soledad le confía el cuidado de la niña a Eloísa, sin saber el peligro que eso significa.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Daniel le cuenta a Soledad los adelantos en sus investigaciones para curar a Aurora de la catalepsia, pero se asombran cuando llega una visita inesperada. Hugo encara a su hermano.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Macario y Lucas ponen una bomba en el hospital para liquidar a Lagarto. Francisca lo presiente y avisa a Alejandro, y vuelve a sufrir un desmayo. Antonia dice que Aníbal se está convirtiendo en un cobarde. Rodrigo reta a Verónica y a sus aliados.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Lucas viola a Cecilia y la deja grave. David la encuentra y enloquece de dolor al enterarse de lo sucedido. Ricardo y Luisa hacen el amor y él comprueba que está curado de su impotencia; quiere rehacer su vida con su esposa. Francisca espera un bebé.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: David golpea con furia a Lucas y lo abandona, pensando que está muerto. Macario llega después y apuñala a Lucas en venganza por el asesinato del Chopo. David se entrega, pero niega su responsabilidad cuando se entera de las puñaladas. Lucas sobrevive.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: David ya sabe que la señora Dantés es su madre. Ella le cuenta por qué se hizo pasar por Verónica y todo lo que sufrió a causa de Antonia. Le pide que disimule frente a su abuela. Lucecita chantajea a Lucho. Antonia busca la ayuda de Alejandro.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Las Elizondo están desconsoladas y Juan se desespera porque no hay noticias de su hermano. Óscar y Jimena encuentran ayuda al atravesar el desierto, se preguntan si se trata de una alucinación.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Ruth se emociona por el regreso de Óscar e invita a los hermanos Reyes a cenar, ellos no pueden resistirse y se conmueven al recordar a Libia. Jimena cuenta cómo sobrevivió al secuestro.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams enter a human bowling competition to help pin down a spot in the final three.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Eleven new teams take off on a race around the world for one-million dollars in the premiere of the fourteenth season of The Amazing Race. The teams take off from the Los Alamitos Joint Forces Training Base near Long Beach, California.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The remaining teams set off from their Pit Stop in Stechelberg in the Burmese Alps and receive a clue instructing them to fly to Munich, Germany and then drive to Ruhpolding, where they will ride a cable car to the top of the mountain.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The remaining teams set off from the Pit Stop at the Schloss Hellbrunn in Salzburg, Austria and receive a clue instructing them to travel by train to Munich and then fly 700 miles to Bucharest, Romania.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The eight remaining teams set off from the Vila Panoramic and receive a clue instructing them to fly through Moscow to Krasnoyarsk, Siberia and then travel to the hydroelectric dam depicted on the back of Russia's ten ruble note.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Having shaken off the shock of the fourth elimination, the seven remaining teams set off from their Pit Stop at the Theater of Musical Comedy in Krasnoyarsk, Siberia, Russia, and receive a clue instructing them to ride the Trans-Siberian Railway.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The seven remaining teams depart from their Pit Stop at the Siberian Colosseum, leaving the cold of Siberia and flying nearly 2,000 miles to the heat of Jaipur, India.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The six remaining teams set off from the Jaigur Fort in Jaipur, India and receive a clue instructing them to fly nearly 2,000 miles to Phuket, Thailand.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The remaining five teams take off from their Pit Stop at the Wat Thep Nimit Temple in Phuket, Thailand and receive a clue instructing them to fly over 400 miles to Bangkok, Thailand.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The five remaining teams set off from the eighth Pit Stop at a royal palace in Bangkok, Thailand and receive a clue instructing them to travel over 1,000 miles to Guilin, China.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final four teams set off from their Pit Stop at the park of the Sun and Moon Pagodas in Guilin, China and receive a clue instructing them to fly north, over 1,000 miles, to Beijing.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The remaining four teams learn that the destination that they have reached is not a Pit Stop and they are still racing. They search the area shops of a Bei Hei streets for a Travelocity roaming gnome, which they must keep until the leg's Pit Stop.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: In the fourteenth season's finale, the final three teams set off from their Pit Stop at the Bird's Nest Stadium in Beijing, China and travel over 5,000 miles to Maui, Hawaii.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Twelve Teams stand at the start line in Los Angeles, Calif., but only 11 will make the journey to Tokyo, Japan as the Racers are faced with a heart-breaking surprise elimination.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Goober buys the gas station with financial backing from Andy and Emmett.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee hosts a TV cooking show and Andy and Opie must fend for themselves.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Emmett is needled into becoming an insurance salesman by his wife and her brother, a successful broker.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie breaks a bottle of expensive perfume on his new job as a drug clerk.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A $500 bequest to the Mayberry church almost provokes a schism over how to spend it.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney Fife is on the spot when he gets Andy to let him use the Taylor home for an American-Russian summit meeting.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Goober tries to impress an old mechanics' school friend by treating him to a lavish dinner and claiming to own a chain of gas stations.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee does well with her flying lessons until the instructor tells her she's ready to go solo -- then she becomes terrified.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy learns that his girlfriend, Helen, was once arrested for carrying a gun, gambling and keeping company with a hoodlum.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Emmett plans to surprise his wife with a mink coat for their 25th wedding anniversary, but she thinks he's not faithful because of his furtive ways.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Howard's mother remarries and moves away, so Howard remodels their home into a bachelor pad and tries to throw a swinging party.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Sam Jones is urged by Andy and his other Mayberry neighbors to run for Town Council.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Sam Jones' son Mike idolizes Opie and doesn't understand why he prefers to spend time with a girl instead of him.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Sam want to find a girlfriend for Goober and convince him to try a computer dating service.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Sam Jones invites a buddy from Italy to help him work his farm but does not expect his family to come too.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy's son, Opie, demands that their new housekeeper, Andy's aunt, be fired after the old one leaves to get married.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy gives the state troopers a lesson in the efficiency of a county sheriff when a dangerous criminal escapes.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A hometown guitar player auditions with a dance band in the Mayberry jail.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Ellie Walker, a pretty young graduate pharmacist, moves to Mayberry to help her uncle out in the local drugstore.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy thinks Ellie is out to marry him. After a series of misunderstandings, Andy finally takes Ellie to the church picnic.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy gives his son, Opie, a lecture on keeping promises, but must break one of his own in order to persuade a runaway kid to come home.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Ellie stage a hold-up at the drugstore so that Barney can impress Miss Rosemary with his heroics.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy makes a judgment concerning his son, Opie, before hearing the boy's side of the story.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy tries to stop a long-time feud between 2 mountain families so their children can get married.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Ellie Walker sets the men and women of Mayberry against each other when she runs for a seat on the town council.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney give a Christmas party in the jail for a prisoner and his family, and thereby convert the town scrooge.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A stranger comes to Mayberry and disrupts the life of the townspeople because he knows everyone's name and business.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Visit this gusty, sandy beach with Bob Ross and see how the approaching menacing clouds hug the great sea and sky ahead.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross creates a proud strong windmill, standing in watch beside old farm buildings where happy little animals lay still in the night.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: A snowy mountain range, an ice-covered lake, and a lost little cabin combine to create a wintry testimony to Bob Ross' artistic magic.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Join Bob Ross as he paints a lovely scenic mountain surrounded by quiet, soft, misty foothills - a beautiful painting that even a beginner can do with ease!

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross takes you to a beautiful lake in high country -- catch a glimpse of magnificent mountains, images echoed in the crystal clear water below.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: With his trusty brushes, Bob Ross takes us to a beautiful lake hideaway nested below a towering mountain.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross takes you on a journey through the majestic forest where you can smell the sweet aroma of pines and taste cool mist in the air.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross helps a timid little stream find its way to a delightful waterfall while gazing upon a forest of elegant trees.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Looking back to those 'days of old', Bob Ross paints a delightful little fishing village with luscious leafy trees in an oval.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: The first snowfall just beyond autumn signals the true beginning of winter -- join Bob Ross as he discovers just such a glorious moment.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack travels to a special animal rescue center in the jungles of Costa Rica, and encounters creatures around every corner. Caiman, Toucan, Iguanas, Howler Monkeys and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi head deep into South Africa's Addo National Park to learn more about its famous Elephant population, and the rest of the Big Seven that call Addo home.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Loango National Park in Gabon is often called Africa's Last Eden. Come along with Jack and his family as they explore the untouched wilderness, encountering Forest Elephants, Forest Buffalo, an injured Sea Turtle and the wildest beach on the planet!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack and Sue as they head to the southern tip of Chile to explore the untamed region of Patagonia! The land beneath the towering Andes Mountains is home to Condors, Guanacos, and some of the most beautiful Glaciers in the world.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is heading to his home state of Tennessee! He meets a one-of-a-kind farm animal living life to the fullest with a prosthetic leg, and a dedicated caregiver who's helping loads of native species get a second chance.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: On a camel trek in Israel, Jack learns first hand about the animal's unique physiology and important contribution to early trade. Later, Jack visits the International Camel Center.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: It's a Colorful Life
programme.desc: Wild animals flaunt their colors for all sorts of reasons: to send a warning, to attract a mate and sometimes, it’s just something they ate! Today, Jack is counting down seven amazing animals that aren’t shy about showing their true colors.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: At Home on the Range
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack saddles up for a farm fresh countdown! Donkeys, musk ox, camels, and all sorts of barnyard fun is in store as Jack travels to ranches and farms from North and South America to the Middle East.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: While in Barro Colorado, a dense forested island in Panama, Jack goes in search of a Harpy the world's largest eagle. The island is home to the famed Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Going the Distance
programme.desc: Jungle Jack counts down nature’s long-distance animal athletes!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: This adventure has Jungle Jack written all over it! Join in as we head deep into the Peruvian Amazon Rainforest get a rare look at Giant River Otters, Pre-Historic Birds, Caimans and much more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi discover beekeepers working to protect the forest, and Jack meets the sacred cows of Rwanda.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Rebounding
programme.desc: Meet six amazing animals rallying from the brink of extinction. Bald eagles, American alligators, Florida manatees, Peregrine falcons and more.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Big cats, gigantic spiders, killer reptiles, stealthy raptors… whether they pack poison, jaws or claws, all of today’s creatures are deadly in their own way.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Today Jack is traveling to visit Terri, Bindi and Robert Irwin and see first-hand how Steve's dream turned into a reality as the Hanna family meets up with the Irwin family at the Australia Zoo. They see Sumatran tigers, elephants, and crocodiles!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he explores some of his favorite beaches and meets the animals that live there, like Sea Turtles, Sea Lions, and loads of other marine life!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Animal Adaptations
programme.desc: From the Arctic to the desert, animals have found a way to survive and thrive in every eco-system on the planet. Join Jack as he’s counting down ten amazing animal adaptations.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Check out this adventure to the Atacama Desert in Chile, where Jack searches for wildlife in the most unlikely of places, and gets a first-hand look at what it's like to live in this harsh yet beautiful environment.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he braves the waters of Botswana's Okavango Delta! The world's largest inland delta provides a beautiful home to thriving wildlife like Crocs, Hippos, and Elephants.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wildlife Crime-Fighters
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is heading to the frontlines witnessing conservation and anti-poaching efforts in action around the world all to help save threatened and endangered species. Rhinos, elephants, primates and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top Predators
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for six ravenous encounters with mighty carnivores at the top of the food chain. Grizzly bears, Nile crocs, lions, African wild dogs, tiger sharks and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi explore South Africa's Thula Thula reserve, known for its heartwarming work saving African elephants.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: On the Caribbean Island of Dominica, Jack climbs up Morne Diablotin in search of the Sisserou, the world's most endangered parrot. Jack also encounters a large Boa Constrictor, then tries to keep pace with a “mountain” chicken.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is heading to the island-nation of Curacao for some quality time with its winged residents. From fearless flying Bats, and powerful Ostrich to pretty-in-pink Flamingos.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Does having a big brain mean you’re the smartest? Find out on today’s countdown as Jungle Jack meets the biggest brainiacs of the animal kingdom, like dolphins, elephants, dogs, sperm whales, chimpanzees and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Once known as the breadbasket of Africa, Zimbabwe is home to some of the most iconic wildlife on the continent. But, drought, poaching, and a lack of resources have left many species fighting for survival.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads to Africa and the front lines of this growing threat to see what can be done to save the rhino from extinction. Jack meets the conservationists who are fighting back using every possible option.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Ace has mixed feelings when a girlfriend from the past returns in a wheelchair.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: An aggressive woman causes confusion when she's sets her sights on the chaperone of a musical group. At the same time, a young woman changes her appearance to get the attention of the man who wouldn't hire her.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A stiff British ex-military officer is put in charge of the fun-loving and energy-filled Menudo group; a young couple is confouded because Doc seems very much in love with his visiting ex-wife, a fact Doc attributes to the fact that he is divorced.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A hurricane devastates the tropical island where a shore party of Capt. Stubing, his crew members, and passengers are held captive by a strange hermit while the Pacific Princess totters under the command of a bumbling deputy captain.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In Part 2, the captain and crew are still marooned.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Julie's parents arrive on board the Pacific Princess and announce their plans to divorce.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A man makes a move on three women; not knowing that they are traveling companions.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Captain Stubing's Uncle Cyrus uses every trick in his devious mind to get Julie alone, until her "Aunt Phoebe" intervenes; a desperate businessman uses his daughter as bait to close a deal.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A shy young man becomes a completely different person at night; a businessman who doesn't have time for his family learns a valuable lesson.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A magician keeps his engagement secret in order to dazzle female audiences, while his neglected fiancee turns to Captain Stubing for comfort.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In "Accidental Cruise," the executive and his secretary come aboard a bit tipsy, are mistaken for another couple, and assigned the honeymoon suite.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In North Carolina, the home of a prominent couple becomes an unlikely scene of terrible bloodshed. Across the country, a California woman vanishes, worrying her family and the investigators trying to find her.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: This show profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts as they work to tell the stories of the young men who went to war (from the French and Indian war to Vietnam) and never came back.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The forces of nature can reduce a body to bones in a matter of weeks. Using a unique combination of art and science, forensic anthropologists give victims a face long after they have been forgotten.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There's never a good reason for murder, but some killers are particularly brutal—choosing their prey at random or with no apparent motive and then cunningly covering their tracks. Even so, telltale clues remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people do get away with murder…at least for a while. Flush with their success, serial killers murder again and again. But each time they kill, they leave behind a few more clues, which ultimately lead to their capture.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Three hairs… microscopic fibers… a common trash bag ripped from a roll. Seemingly small and insignificant clues become a victim's silent witness.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In Columbus, Ohio, a woman is found shot in the head. The death is ruled a suicide, but something is not right and detectives refuse to let the matter rest.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A New York homebuyer gets more than he bargained for when a house inspection turns up a mummified corpse. For decades, the crime had gone undiscovered. The victim unmissed, and the killer unpunished.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Men don't have a monopoly on murder, but it's still extraordinary when women kill. Though female killers are as deadly as males, they choose less violent methods.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In New York, an ambitious college student has her whole life ahead of her, until she crosses the path of a killer. It's a random murder, the hardest kind to solve.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Poison is the subtlest form of death, and investigators must see through unusual circumstances to bring these murders to light.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes, the cause of death does not match the scene of the crime. When an untraceable poison is used to commit murder, homicide detectives turn to forensic toxicologists to follow a killer's tracks and expose a toxic death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes when a death seems to be accidental or the result of a tragic accident, it is up to forensic scientists to reveal the deception lying just below the surface.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some killers choose to hide their victims – And investigators must then rely on forensic examiners to uncover proof of murder – These are just two extraordinary crimes that have made their way into the medical examiner's casebook.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.desc: An Englishman arrives with a custom-made rifle and a plan to kill Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Len Richards and his brother, Ab, confront a Lucas McCain look-alike, Earl Bantry and his sidekick K.C. Peters, for slaughtering one of Richards' steers.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.desc: Mark and Milly are shocked when Lucas begins gambling. They don't know that Lucas is "undercover" trying to catch a man cheating.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.desc: No one is more surprised than Micah when newcomer Leota Carraway claims he's her long-lost husband and the father of her child.

programme.desc: Lucas is torn by conflicting emotions when he meets the town's new preacher, a former outlaw whom the Rifleman vowed to kill.

programme.desc: The town of North Fork becomes a haven for outlaws when suave Ben Judson smooth-talks his way into the marshal's job.

programme.desc: A handsome gambler moves into town and begins wooing Milly Scott, claiming to have known her deceased brother.

programme.desc: Lucas develops temporary amnesia from a head injury while visiting a strange town and mistakenly assumes the identity of a wanted criminal.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While trapped in the ghost town saloon, Lucas tries to come up with a plan to escape with his son and Micah after Mark refuses to leave without him.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lou Mallory arrives in North Fork and starts buying up land and businesses. Lou and Lucas start disliking each other after she reveals plans to build a railroad on "worthless" land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a woman arrives in North Fork with symptoms of smallpox, Lucas, Lou Mallory, Doctor Burrage, and hotel occupants are quarantined in the hotel with an outlaw.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A young woman lying in a hospital bed, her head wrapped in bandages, awaits the outcome of a surgical procedure performed by the State in a last-ditch attempt to make her look 'normal'.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pair of newlyweds stopping in a small town are trapped by their own superstition when playing a fortune-telling machine in a local diner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The daughter of an inventor objects to their 'perfect' home where they are waited on by mechanical servants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A nostalgic actor revisits his late wife and friends at their old haunt, only to find that he is now out of place there.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When three dum-dum crooks get ahold of a camera that takes pictures of the future, they set out to make a quick fortune with their new toy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After a derelict Santa Claus is fired on Christmas Eve, he finds a mysterious bag that gives out presents. With this bag he sets out to fulfill his one wish - to see the less fortunate inherit the bounties of Christmas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In a tragic, western town, a desperate father begs for clemency as his son is slated to die for an accident he could not have prevented.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: At a prominent club in Washington, D.C., a socialite argues about whether it would be possible to change history by traveling back in time. When he leaves the club he finds himself in 1865, on the night that President Lincoln will be shot.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A used car salesman buys a car that dooms him to tell only the truth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a woman investigates a clamor on the roof of her rural house, she discovers a small UFO and little aliens emerging from it. Or so it seems.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Gaining telepathic abilities when his coin lands on its edge bank clerk Hector B. Poole learns about the difference between other people's plans and fantasies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: While in the hospital recovering from overwork, Liz Powell keeps dreaming about going down to the hospital morgue.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Passing through the sound barrier a commercial airliner inadvertently travels back in time.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A timid vacuum-cleaner salesman is given the strength of 300 men by some experimenting aliens.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An old radio is taking bitter bachelor Ed Lindsay back to a happier time before what he considers worthless tripe on television when he starts picking up radio programs from the 1930's and 1940's.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler cajoles his friend to use his telekinesis to affect the results of the gambling tables in Las Vegas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A toy telephone becomes the link between a young boy and his dead grandmother.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pioneer from a wagon train in 1847 sets off to find something for his ill son and stumbles into present-day New Mexico.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After successfully stealing a gold shipment, a group of criminals and their scientist accomplice put themselves in suspended animation in a remote desert cave. When they awaken decades later, complications ensue when their truck is destroyed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Annoyed by a club member's constant chatter, a man bets him he cannot remain silent for a year, living in a glass enclosure in the club basement.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Adam Grant is trapped in a recurring nightmare, in which he is sentenced to death and executed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Using the power of mind over matter, Archibald Beechcroft remakes the world to his own specifications.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Following a frantic phone call about a crashed spaceship, two policeman try and determine who among the passengers of a bus at a snowed-in roadside diner is from another world.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In a future totalitarian society, a librarian is declared obsolete and sentenced to death.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie's mission takes the team through a subway tunnel, challenged by lurking walkers and a recalcitrant Negan; with Eugene's group, Yumiko seeks answers about her brother and demands expedited processing into the Commonwealth.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie's mission team gets separated and hunted by the Reapers; Carol, Rosita, Magna and Kelly attempt to catch horses for Alexandria; Judith, RJ, Hershel and Gracie cope with their parents going away.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Dog get captured by the Reapers; they are taken to the Meridian and reconnect with a familiar figure from their past.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Aaron, Carol, Lydia, and Jerry go to the Hilltop ruins for blacksmith tools and nearby game; Eugene's group goes through orientation at the Commonwealth; Maggie and Negan trudge through the woods; Judith and the kids clash with teenagers.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Escaping from walkers, Connie and Virgil hide in a house occupied by mysterious creatures; Pope tests Daryl's loyalty to the Reapers with a conflicting mission; Kelly leaves Alexandria in search of Connie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie and Elijah learn a new survival tactic from Negan; Eugene's group clears walkers to pay their fines; Yumiko interviews for an upper-class job; Daryl learns more about Leah and the Reapers; Gabriel encounters a man of God.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Reapers defend Meridian from an incoming herd; Pope suspects Maggie is behind the attack, while Daryl treads carefully; Alexandrians scramble to protect themselves when a violent storm leaves them vulnerable to walkers.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl, Maggie, Gabriel, Negan and Elijah battle the Reapers for food; Aaron and the Alexandrians must survive a storm.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The heroes experience Halloween in the Commonwealth; Daryl and Rosita undergo military training led by Mercer; Carol investigates Ezekiel's medical condition.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene looks for Stephanie after she mysteriously goes missing; Connie investigates a story on Trooper Davis; Carol helps Hornsby with a labor dispute at a drug farm.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Aaron and Maggie meet Gov. Pamela Milton as she tours Alexandria, Oceanside and Hilltop; Ezekiel finds himself lucky during a routine checkup; Eugene processes Max's story.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia and Elijah help a stranger from another community called Riverbend; they run into Aaron, who tells them about a mission he embarked on with Gabriel as emissaries for the Commonwealth.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia and Elijah help Aaron and Gabriel on a rescue mission; in the chaos, Negan finds himself watching over Hershel; Sebastian coerces Daryl and Rosita into pulling a heist.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hornsby marches Daryl and troops to confront Maggie at Hilltop; after a harrowing heist, Rosita gets Connie, Kelly, Eugene, and Max to investigate the Miltons; Ezekiel helps hospital patients in need.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie prepares to defend Hilltop and the people of Riverbend against Hornsby; Hornsby hires Leah to kill Maggie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los Saviors poseen un arma de gran potencia que pretenden transportar para ayudar a Negan. Ezekiel, que ha sobrevivido a la matanza de sus hombres, y Carol, aislada en territorio enemigo, son los únicos que pueden impedir la entrega del arma.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Gabriel y Negan tienen que cooperar para salir con vida de la casa en la que están encerrados, con decenas de muertos vivientes tratando de comérselos. Mientras, los lugartenientes de Negan se dan cuenta de que uno de ellos es un traidor, ¿quién?

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick visita a Jadis para convencerla de que se una a ellos en la lucha contra Negan. En Hilltop, Gregory sugiere a Maggie, que está enojada con Jesus porque está alimentando a los prisioneros, que los ahorque. Carl se encuentra con Siddiq.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Tara rompen el muro del Santuario y los zombis entran al recinto. Negan exige a Eugene que idee una manera de sacarlos con vida de allí. Jadis prepara a Rick una muerte horrenda.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Negan y sus hombres atacan a las tres comunidades rebeldes al mismo tiempo. Sin Rick, Carl asume la defensa de Alexandria, cercada por el propio Negan. Mientras, Simon detiene al ejército de Hilltop en la carretera y Gavin quiere capturar a Ezekiel.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carl hace una última petición a Rick y Michonne antes de morir. Mientras tanto, Morgan y Carol intentan rescatar a Ezekiel antes de que Gavin se lo entregue vivo a Negan para que este lo torture y asesine delante de sus seguidores.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Negan ordena a Simon que mate solo a uno de los hombres de Jadis como escarmiento, pero Simon tiene sed de venganza. Mientras, Rick se dirige al basurero del grupo de Jadis para renovar su alianza, y Aaron sigue intentando obtener un acuerdo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A Maggie se le acaban las reservas de alimentos y debe decidir si deja que los presos pasen hambre. Mientras, Daryl guía a los supervivientes de Alexandria a través de un pantano repleto de zombis, y la adversidad pone a prueba la fe de Gabriel.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick ataca a Negan cuando este se dirigía a Hilltop y terminan enfrentándose en un edificio abandonado, pero Simon y Dwight siguen el rastro de Negan. Mientras tanto, Maggie, Enid, Michonne y Rosita discuten sobre la propuesta de una desconocida.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los Saviors, ahora dirigidos por Simon, atacan Hilltop pese a que algunos de sus combatientes están dentro, presos. Maggie organiza la defensa del poblado pero, ¿podrán evitar una masacre como la que Simon perpetró contra el grupo de Jadis?

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Jadis planea una muerte horrenda para Negan. Mientras, Morgan va en busca de Henry y Rick sale de Hilltop para cazar a los que huyeron durante el asalto comandado por Simon. Finalmente, los dos se encuentran en territorio enemigo.

programme.title: Bernard Hopkins vs Oscar De La Hoya

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Foes Jungle Grrrl and The Beast are forced to put aside their differences to battle The Monsters of Madness, Havok, and Hazard. Can the two animals of the ring coexist long enough to secure victory? The Tag Team Championship Series continues.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The animals of the ring, The Beast and Jungle Grrrl battle to determine dominance. Meanwhile, WOW World Champion Tessa Blanchard seizes an opportunity to settle a score.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: After months of being bullied, Stephy Slays finally gets her shot at revenge against The Governor’s Daughter, Abilene Maverick. The Tag Team Championship continues when The Monsters of Madness battle The Dixie Darlings, Jolene, and Jolynn.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Champion Tessa Blanchard and The Greatest Attorney in the World, Sophia Lopez conspire In an attempt to derail The Beast’s path to The WOW World Championship Title by placing The Norweigen Nightmare, Nikki Krampus in her way.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Anticipation builds as Jungle Grrrl gets a rematch against The Beast to determine the rightful contender to the WOW World Championship. To ensure a fair outcome, Champion Tessa Blanchard has been barred from ringside.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Jungle Grrrl calls out The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard for her Championship Match. With her back against the well, Tessa is forced to get creative and strikes a deal with The Fabulous Lana Star. Will The Fabulous One help Tessa Blanchard or turn on her?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Beast calls out The Fabulous Lana Star for costing her a shot at The WOW World Championship. And Jungle Grrrl finally battles The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard for the WOW World Championship in The Main Event.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Chaos, disorder, bedlam, and madness are all promised in a high-stakes Three-Way Elimination between The Monsters of Madness, Havok and Hazard, Holidead and Siren The Voodoo Doll, & Adrenaline and Fire.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: It’s The Monsters of Madness vs. Adrenaline and Fire. Both teams will test their metal. In the end, only one will claim victory as The WOW Tag Team Champions of the World! Will speed overcome power and strength? Or will size dominate the underdogs?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Since day one when Abilene Maverick 'accidentally' poured tea on Stephy Slays, Stephy has endured Abilene’s teasing and bullying. After avoiding a match with Stephy on several occasions due to suspicious claims of injury, the match has finally been set.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Fans previously witnessed the rise of The Beast as the new WOW World Champion. The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard plots to get the championship belt back by partnering with The World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man with unwavering faith in a legend about lost treasure hires Josh to lead his family on an expedition into the desert to locate the cache of Spanish gold.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When a young runaway is framed for killing a Pinkerton agent, Randall turns detective to uncover the real killer.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is requested to meet a famous singer at the opera house in Denver who has a job for him.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh comes to the aid of his old friend Jesse, who is being strong-armed into selling the Outrider Hotel and Saloon owned by his beautiful girlfriend.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A decidedly different and dangerous assignment awaits Josh when he agrees to go into the Apache camp and compete in their contests to win the hand of a woman.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Pursuing killer Joe Collins into the Superstition Mountains, Josh is followed by a man who believes Collins could be his long-lost son.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A blindly obedient religious cult cast lots and it falls upon a young woman to act as its angel of vengeance.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh receives a letter from a girl at the St.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A concerned father hires Josh to retrieve his son, a passionate young ideologue whose gift for rousing rhetoric is being used by plunderers to recruit freedom fighters.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh's big talk after a dog is shot lands him in big trouble when his browbeating the locals in the saloon about ending the decades-long Carter-Blake feud.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To track down the cheating tinhorn gambler Johnny Deuce and recover his money, Randall befriends the card sharp's protégé, a 12-year-old orphan boy and card cheat, nicknamed The Montana Kid.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh embarks on a mission of mercy when he pleads with the parents of a boy with appendicitis to let the doctor operate.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh reluctantly accepts an offbeat assignment: finding a beautiful bride for his bashful buddy Charlie, the homeliest and loneliest man in the West.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The government employs Randall to portray an escaped prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole and stashed away in a secret location.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall finds his prey in the hands of a lynch mob wiping out his bounty.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Who needs enemies with friends like the residents of Rogue City, who celebrate Randall for bringing in notorious killer Jumbo Kane.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is rooked out of his bounty by crafty criminal Hunt Willis and his accomplice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Against better judgment after losing a quick draw contest and bet, Josh serves as a guide for a dandified East Coast gun salesman who comes west to retrieve and replace a defective gun he sold to notorious outlaw Curly Bill Brocius.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: On the trail of a Cavalry deserter and the horses he stole, Josh rides into a town ruled as the private fiefdom of its autocratic, psychopathic marshal who is holding the horses and deserter.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Hired by a father to bring back the man who killed his son Josh is surprised when he doesn't get paid because he brought the man back alive.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh must bring a man back for murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings a wanted man into the Mesa City Sheriff, only to find he killed the sheriff's brother.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is looking for a man who, while trying to rob a bank, is bitten by a rabid dog.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man shoots his brother over ownership of their property and blames it on an Indian who reclaimed his horse the man found and stole.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is captured by a corrupt deputy and is forced by the sheriff to work on a chain gang in a gold mine.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is tracking an escape artist who is forced to distract a town, letting three guys rob the bank.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A retired colonel sends Paladin to a Nevada mining town to find out what happened to a woman.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: When Paladin finds a woman and her apparently typhoid-afflicted child abandoned by a wagonmaster, he enlists the aid of a doctor from a nearby town, but a religious fanatic then tries to bar them from entry.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin escorts an Englishman to his cousin's ranch they have inherited in Montana, but finds that an embittered trader is plotting against them.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Accompanying a cavalry major on a mission to prevent a war by negotiating a treaty with an elusive Apache chief, Paladin must deal with soldiers who have caught gold fever.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
